tool_description: Emotion Detection in text using NLP
name: NLP-MicroSaaS
title: NLP-MicroSaaS

api_list.name: detectEmotion
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nlp-microsaas.p.rapidapi.com/detectemotion"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nlp-microsaas.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nlp-microsaas.p.rapidapi.com/detectemotion"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nlp-microsaas.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
